Package org.jpac.alarm

Class Summary
Alarm represents an alarm which can be generated by a module, if for an example a signals gets invalid, or another exception appears.
AlarmAcknowledged process event indicating, that an alarm has been acknowledged by the user
AlarmGone process event indicating that an alarm condition has been gone
AlarmQueue central registry for all alarms instantiated inside an application implemented as singleton
AlarmQueueEntry represents an alarm queue entry
AlarmRaised process event indicating that an alarm has been raised by a module
 

Exception Summary
AlarmPendingException thrown, if an attempt is made to acknowledge an alarm which is still pending.
